mapper.sql: cp.creator_id, cp.updated_id, cp.created_time, cp.updated_time,cp.ref_id cp.id, cp.project_name, cp.project_introduction, cp.principal_name, cp.principal_phone, cp.legal_person_name, cp.legal_person_phone, cp.project_type, cp.project_status, cp.country, cp.province, cp.city, cp.address,cp.owner_name, cp.assets_develop_agency,cp.initiation_date ,cp.carbon_methodology, cp.approval_date, cp.record_filing_date, cp.certified_date, cp.issuing_date, cp.tenant_id
mapper.select: SELECT xci.unit, xci.description, xci.data_use, xci.comment, xcm.mode_name, xcid.qa_qc_program, xcid.method_program, xcid.frequence, xcf.source_from, cp.created_time, cp.creator_id, cp.updated_time, cp.updated_id FROM (carbon_project cp) LEFT JOIN x_carbon_methodology_index xcmi ON cp.carbon_methodology=xcmi.methodology_code LEFT JOIN x_carbon_index xci ON xcmi.index_code=xci.code LEFT JOIN x_carbon_model xcm ON xcm.index_code=xci.code LEFT JOIN x_carbon_index_detection xcid ON xcid.index_code=xci.code LEFT JOIN x_carbon_factor xcf ON xcf.index_code=xci.code WHERE cp.id=#{id} AND xci.category ='非计算' AND xci.type='项目' GROUP BY xci.`code`
SELECT xcf.parameter_list FROM x_carbon_factor xcf LEFT JOIN x_carbon_factor_project xcfp ON xcfp.factor_code=xcf.factor_code WHERE xcfp.project_id= #{id}
SELECT cp.id FROM carbon_project cp left join carbon_metaregistry cm ON cm.ref_id = cp.ref_id WHERE cm.id = #{id}
